Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.architectures

HIOA DEVS model descriptors for inclusion in architectures.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicHIOA_Descriptor
    The class AtomicHIOA_Descriptor describes atomic HIOA in DEVS simulation architectures, associating their URI, their imported and exported event types, their imported and exported variables as well as a factory that can be used to instantiate a model object to run simulations.
    CoupledHIOA_Descriptor
    The class CoupledHIOA_Descriptor describes coupled HIOA in model architectures, associating their URI, their static information, as well as a factory that can be used to instantiate a coupled HIOA object to run simulations.
    HIOA_Composer
    The class HIOA_Composer provides methods implementing HIOA composition; it is abstract as it only defines static methods.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.architectures Description

HIOA DEVS model descriptors for inclusion in architectures.

This package implements architectures of HIOA DEVS simulation models. In this library, architectures are descriptions of models that must be instantiated and connected in order to form a composed model ready to be run. The package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures defines the overall architectures. This package defines the descriptions of atomic and coupled HIOA models that are included into overall architectures.
